title: Reduced Enderman Griefing
description_short: Prevent Enderman from picking up world surface blocks
description: Prevent Enderman from pulling apart worlds in active areas

features.label: Enderman are unable to pickup grass and dirt blocks, clay, netherrack, crimson and warped nylium, sand, gravel and mushrooms
Compatible with Minecraft 1.13 and up, last tested on Minecraft 1.20
